author: Kate Morris and Sally Brown
programme: I Can Cook on the Go
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Grease a loaf tin with a little vegetable oil. In a bowl, mix together the grated apple, dried fruit, oats and sugar until well combined. Stir in the apple juice and oil.  Scoop the mixture into the prepared loaf tin and flatten it into the corners using a palette knife.  Bake in the oven for about 25 minutes, or until the oats are golden-brown. Set aside to cool slightly, then turn out onto a wire rack to cool completely. To serve, cut into four fingers.
